snippet: Since taking the reins of 21st Century Fox, James and Lachlan Murdoch have made changes big and small, but have largely left Fox News alone. Now they have little choice but to step in....
abstract: Lawsuit filed by former Fox News host Gretchen Carlson against Roger Ailes may force hand of James and Lachlan Murdoch, who have left cable news channel untouched in otherwise busy year spent remaking much of parent company 21st Century Fox; sexual harassment suit represents biggest leadership challenge brothers have faced since being given control of company by their father Rupert Murdoch.

byline.original: By BROOKS BARNES and EMILY STEEL
byline.contributor: Brooks Barnes reported from Los Angeles and Emily Steel from New York.

lead_paragraph: Since taking the reins of 21st Century Fox, James and Lachlan Murdoch have made changes big and small, but have largely left Fox News alone. Now they have little choice but to step in.

headline.main: Murdoch Brothers’ Challenge: What Happens Next at Fox News?
